title: 21 Smol Cat Memes for the Small Hours of Sunday to Help You Brace Yourself for Monday
description: Cats are so cute it makes them the best distraction from… anything, really. You just sit there, focused on how insanely cute this little creature is, and any thoughts you had before are just gone. A cat just needs to be present, not even doing anything special, for this meowgical power to work - all you need to do is look at the cat, and that's it, the meowgic works. All your focus is now on the cat. Because cats are simply that cute. This meowing magical experience works even better if you pet the cat and interact with them - because there' no blissful feeling as that of a cat giving you attention and love.To help you this Sunday, we prepared a batch of adorable cat memes to work their meowing magic on you - so you can brace for this upcoming Monday with meowing cat confidence. You might see them on Sunday morning, to have a very good mood during the day, or see them in the small hours of night, to feel better right before Monday comes.
author: Ayala Sorotsky
excerpt: 21 Smol Cat Memes for the Small Hours of Sunday to Help You Brace Yourself for Monday - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
Cats are so cute it makes them the best distraction from… anything, really. You just sit there, focused on how insanely cute this little creature is, and any thoughts you had before are just gone. A cat just needs to be present, not even doing anything special, for this meowgical power to work - all you need to do is look at the cat, and that's it, the meowgic works. All your focus is now on the cat. Because cats are simply that cute. This meowing magical experience works even better if you pet the cat and interact with them - because there' no blissful feeling as that of a cat giving you attention and love.

To help you this Sunday, we prepared a batch of adorable cat memes to work their meowing magic on you - so you can brace for this upcoming Monday with meowing cat confidence. You might see them on Sunday morning, to have a very good mood during the day, or see them in the small hours of night, to feel better right before Monday comes.
